topic.title: EMS Past Medical History Section - conformance rules

lines.i: Collection of information regarding the patient's medical history

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.19"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10059)/@code="67842-5" EMS past medical history Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10058)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Past Medical History" (CONF:10060)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10903)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Existence Of History Of Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.60)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..*] entry (CONF:10905)
Contains exactly one [1..1] History Of Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.61)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10059)/@code="67842-5" EMS past medical history Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10058)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Past Medical History" (CONF:10060)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10903)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Existence Of History Of Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.60)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..*] entry (CONF:10905)
Contains exactly one [1..1] History Of Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.61)

body.codeblock:
